languages.text: "Хочешь улизнуть на вечеринку и бросить меня тут? Нет уж. Очевидно, что они там развлекаются как могут! Могли бы и нас с собой взять, но — нет, мы сторожим гондолы. Жадные ублюдки... Эй, кажется, несколько игрушек ускользнули с праздника!"

traits.locale_text: "Что, хочешь улизнуть на вечеринку и бросить меня тут? Нет уж. Очевидно, что эти скотины там развлекаются как могут! Могли бы и нас с собой взять, но нет: "Кто-то же должен охранять Рейдеры!" Твари все они".

languages.text: "You want to join the revelry and leave me here? Stay where you are, they are just enjoying themselves. They could have taken us with them, but no, they had to make us play guards instead. Greedy filthspawn... Look at this! I think a few playthings have slipped away from the festivities!"
languages.original_text: "Хочешь улизнуть на вечеринку и бросить меня тут? Нет уж. Очевидно, что они там развлекаются как могут! Могли бы и нас с собой взять, но — нет, мы сторожим гондолы. Жадные ублюдки... Эй, кажется, несколько игрушек ускользнули с праздника!"

traits.locale_text: "You want to join the revelry and leave me here? Stay where you are, they're just enjoying themselves. They could have taken us with them, but no, they had to make us play guards instead. The greedy filthspawn... Look at this! I think a few playthings have slipped away from the festivities!"

"You want to join the revelry and leave me here? Stay where you are, they're just enjoying themselves. They could have taken us with them, but no, they had to make us play guards instead. The greedy filthspawn... Look at this! I think a few playthings have slipped away from the festivities!"

"You want to join the revelry and leave me here? Stay where you are, they are just enjoying themselves. They could have taken us with them, but no, they had to make us play guards instead. Greedy filthspawn... Look at this! I think a few playthings have slipped away from the festivities!"

"You want to join the revelry and leave me here? Stay where you are, they are just enjoying themselves. They could have taken us with them, but no, they had to make us play guards instead. Greedy filthspawn... Look at this! I think a few playthings have slipped away from the festivities!"

languages.text: « Vous comptez vous joindre à la fête et me laisser sur le carreau ? Restez avec moi, ils sont juste en train de passer du bon temps. Ils auraient pu nous proposer de venir avec eux, mais non ! Il a fallu qu'on reste ici pour monter la garde. Vermines égoïstes... Oh, regardez ! On dirait que des jouets ont réussi à s'enfuir ! »
languages.original_text: "You want to join the revelry and leave me here? Stay where you are, they are just enjoying themselves. They could have taken us with them, but no, they had to make us play guards instead. Greedy filthspawn... Look at this! I think a few playthings have slipped away from the festivities!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous comptez vous joindre à la fête et me laisser sur le carreau ? Restez avec moi, ils sont juste en train de passer du bon temps. Ils auraient pu nous proposer de venir avec eux, mais non ! Il a fallu qu'on reste ici pour monter la garde. Vermines égoïstes... Oh, regardez ! On dirait que des jouets ont réussi à s'enfuir ! »

languages.text: “你是打算一个人加入狂欢，把我留在这里吗？你哪都别想去，他们都在好好享受呢。他们本可以把我们一起带过去，可他们偏让我们在这里站岗，那群贪婪鬼……快看！好像有几个玩具从庆典活动里溜出来了！”
languages.original_text: "You want to join the revelry and leave me here? Stay where you are, they are just enjoying themselves. They could have taken us with them, but no, they had to make us play guards instead. Greedy filthspawn... Look at this! I think a few playthings have slipped away from the festivities!"

traits.locale_text: “你是打算一个人加入狂欢，把我留在这里吗？你哪都别想去，他们都在好好享受呢。他们本可以把我们一起带过去，可他们偏让我们在这里站岗，那群贪婪鬼……快看！好像有几个玩具从庆典活动里溜出来了！”

languages.text: 「俺を置いてお祭り騒ぎに加わりたいのか？やめておけ。連中は楽しんでいるだけだ。奴らは俺たちを連れて行くこともできたのに、そうせずに衛兵をやらせた。強欲なゴミどもめ…見ろ！お祭りからこっそり抜け出したオモチャがいるようだぞ！」
languages.original_text: "You want to join the revelry and leave me here? Stay where you are, they are just enjoying themselves. They could have taken us with them, but no, they had to make us play guards instead. Greedy filthspawn... Look at this! I think a few playthings have slipped away from the festivities!"

traits.locale_text: 「俺を置いてお祭り騒ぎに加わりたいのか？やめておけ。連中は楽しんでいるだけだ。奴らは俺たちを連れて行くこともできたのに、そうせずに衛兵をやらせた。強欲なゴミどもめ…見ろ！お祭りからこっそり抜け出したオモチャがいるようだぞ！」

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr da mitfeiern und mich hier zurücklassen? Bleibt hier, sie vergnügen sich nur ein bisschen. Sie hätten uns mitnehmen können, aber nein, sie mussten ja dafür sorgen, dass wir Wachen spielen. Gieriges Gesindel ... Schaut mal! Ich glaube, ein paar Spielzeuge haben sich von den Feierlichkeiten weggestohlen!"
languages.original_text: "You want to join the revelry and leave me here? Stay where you are, they are just enjoying themselves. They could have taken us with them, but no, they had to make us play guards instead. Greedy filthspawn... Look at this! I think a few playthings have slipped away from the festivities!"

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr da mitfeiern und mich hier zurücklassen? Bleibt hier, sie vergnügen sich nur ein bisschen. Sie hätten uns mitnehmen können, aber nein, sie mussten ja dafür sorgen, dass wir Wachen spielen. Gieriges Gesindel ... Schaut mal! Ich glaube, ein paar Spielzeuge haben sich von den Feierlichkeiten weggestohlen!"

languages.text: «¿Pretendes unirte a la juerga y dejarme aquí tirado? Quédate donde estás, solo se están divirtiendo. Podrían habernos llevado a nosotros también, pero no, en vez de eso nos toca hacer de guardias. Canallas asquerosos y egoístas... ¡Anda, mira! ¡Creo que unos juguetes se han escabullido de la fiesta!».
languages.original_text: "You want to join the revelry and leave me here? Stay where you are, they are just enjoying themselves. They could have taken us with them, but no, they had to make us play guards instead. Greedy filthspawn... Look at this! I think a few playthings have slipped away from the festivities!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Pretendes unirte a la juerga y dejarme aquí tirado? Quédate donde estás, solo se están divirtiendo. Podrían habernos llevado a nosotros también, pero no, en vez de eso nos toca hacer de guardias. Canallas asquerosos y egoístas... ¡Anda, mira! ¡Creo que unos juguetes se han escabullido de la fiesta!».

languages.text: "Cümbüşe katılıp beni burada bırakmak mı istiyorsun? Dur durduğun yerde, millet keyfine bakıyor işte. İsteseler bizi de yanlarına alırlardı ama yok, onun yerine bize muhafızcılık oynattırıyorlar. Doymak bilmez leş dölleri... Baksana! Galiba şu oyuncaklar, şenlikten sıvışmayı başarmış!"
languages.original_text: "You want to join the revelry and leave me here? Stay where you are, they are just enjoying themselves. They could have taken us with them, but no, they had to make us play guards instead. Greedy filthspawn... Look at this! I think a few playthings have slipped away from the festivities!"

traits.locale_text: "Cümbüşe katılıp beni burada bırakmak mı istiyorsun? Dur durduğun yerde, millet keyfine bakıyor işte. İsteseler bizi de yanlarına alırlardı ama yok, onun yerine bize muhafızcılık oynattırıyorlar. Doymak bilmez leş dölleri... Baksana! Galiba birkaç oyuncak şenlikten sıvışmayı başarmış!"
